to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view

Class BearingOfCarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view.BearingOfCarView

  • public class BearingOfCarView
extends View
    Draws a rectangle with the bearing of the car.
    Author:
    sven
